programme.title: CYC TV
programme.desc: Christian Youth Channel - CYC aka Coptic Youth Channel, is a television and internet based English Coptic Orthodox Channel. CYC is the first English Coptic Christian channel, dedicated to Christians all around the world to spread the teachings and love of Jesus Christ. CYC looks to spread the word and life of Christ all through the world in a way that is compatible with today’s media consumption methods.

programme.title: CTV
programme.desc: CTV is the official channel of the Coptic Orthodox Church, run under the care and blessings of our Supreme Pontiff, His Holiness Pope Shenouda III, Pope of Alexandria and Patriarch of the See of St. Mark, may the Lord prolong his life for many years and healthy, safe eras.The channel presents all manner of art and television programs which reflect the original proper Orthodox faith and the Church's message, founded on love and peace within a framework of professional international media, which occasioned its enormous success. قناة سي تي في هي القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية، تحت رعاية قداسة البابا المعظم الأنبا تواضروس الثاني، بابا الإسكندرية وبطريرك الكرازة المرقسية، أدام الله رئاسته لنا سنينًا عديدة وأزمنة سلامية هادئة مديدة. وتقوم القناة بتقديم كافة أنواع الفنون والبرامج التليفزيونية التي تعكس أصالة وجوهر وسلامة العقيدة الأرثوذكسية ورسالة الكنيسة القائمة على المحبة والسلام في إطار من الحرفية الإعلامية.

programme.title: MESat TV
programme.desc: ME Sat TV, is a Christian Orthodox channel; aims to serve Christians worldwide through the broadcast of spiritual, social and health-related programmes. قناة مى سات، القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية تنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

programme.title: Aghapy TV
programme.desc: Aghapy TV, the very first Coptic Orthodox Christian satellite channel, aims to serve Christians worldwide through the broadcast of spiritual, social and health-related programmes. قناة أغابي هي أول قناة أورثوذكسية قبطية تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات من كنائس مختلفة وأحيانًا تبث قداسات باللغة الإنجليزية من كنائس قبطية بالولايات المتحدة الأمريكية وكندا.

programme.title: Logos TV
programme.desc: Logos TV is a Christian Orthodox channel; its message is testimony to our good Lord Jesus Christ according to our Orthodox faith. The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..

The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..

programme.title: El Maqar TV
programme.desc: El Maqar TV - A Coptic TV Channel under the see of H.H. Pope Tawadros II and his partner in the service H.G. Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: A distinctively emotional round of mood-enhancing songs. حناجر ذهبية تؤدي أجمل الأغنيات التي تناسب كل الأذواق والأمزجة.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Arabic hits that simply strike the right note for a fulfilling musical experience. أشهر الأغاني العربية المصورة التي تناسب جميع الأذواق وتلعب على أوتار القلب فتارة يذوب حناناً ورقة، وطوراً تتسارع دقاته مع الإيقاع فيفيض حيوية وبهجة.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Free TV is the Number One Music channel in Lebanon. In addition to airing the largest number of latest hits and exclusive music videos, Free TV also produces different entertainment shows all of which are directly related to music and celebrities. قناة فري تي-في هي الوجهة الأولى للموسيقى في لبنان، وبالإضافة إلى بث أكبر عدد من أنجح الأغاني الحديثة، تقوم القناة بإنتاج العديد من البرامج الترفيهية المرتبطة مباشرة بالموسيقى ومشاهير عالم الفن.

In addition to airing the largest number of latest hits and exclusive music videos, Free TV also produces different entertainment shows all of which are directly related to music and celebrities. قناة مزيكا تي-في هي الوجهة الأولى للموسيقى في لبنان، وبالإضافة إلى بث أكبر عدد من أنجح الأغاني الحديثة، تقوم القناة بإنتاج العديد من البرامج الترفيهية المرتبطة مباشرة بالموسيقى ومشاهير عالم الفن.

programme.desc: A distinctively emotional round of mood-enhancing songs. حناجر ذهبية تؤدي أجمل الأغنيات التي تناسب كل الأذواق والأمزجة.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: Corals build themselves homes of limestone in the warm, clear, shallow seas of the tropics. Their reefs occupy less than one tenth of one per cent of the ocean floor, yet they are home to a quarter of all known marine species.

programme.title: Earth's Great Seasons
programme.desc: Celebrate the glorious nature of summer on Earth and the extraordinary ways animals and plants rise to the challenges it brings.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: A journey from the intense heat of the tropics to the planet's frozen poles. Life has spread to almost every part of the ocean, but there are many different worlds within it, and each presents unique challenges.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: Visit the unknown to discover an unimaginable abundance of life in the pitch-black darkness of the seabed. Antarctica is the coldest, harshest and most remote continent on earth.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: At the coast, two worlds collide. Coasts is the story of how our wildlife survives in this ever-changing world. It's a roller-coaster ride of heart-stopping action and epic drama, with characters from beautiful to bizarre.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: The big blue is the world's greatest wilderness. It is a marine desert far from shore and many kilometers deep with nothing to eat and nowhere to hide.

programme.title: Earth's Great Seasons
programme.desc: Celebrate the glorious nature of summer on Earth and the extraordinary ways animals and plants rise to the challenges it brings.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: In our green seas, competition is fierce. Sunlight powers vast kelp forests, mangroves, prairies of seagrass and blooms of algae. Here, animals must fight for space and food. In kelp forests, a common octopus must become the ultimate escape artist.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: Corals build themselves homes of limestone in the warm, clear, shallow seas of the tropics. Their reefs occupy less than one tenth of one per cent of the ocean floor, yet they are home to a quarter of all known marine species.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: Explore parts of the ocean that have never been visited, encounter extraordinary animals and discover insights into life beneath the waves. Sir David Attenborough then examines the impact of human activity.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: The stories behind Planet Earth: Blue Planet II's most memorable moments. Discover what went into creating this stunning series, as the crews reveal the lengths they went to and the ground-breaking filming technology.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A deer hunter pleads ignorance when caught with tree stands on private property. Officer Crouse catches a group of ATV speedsters, and Officer MacFazden investigates a suspicious bear kill.

programme.title: Finding Bigfoot

programme.title: Finding Bigfoot

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: A young boy is accidentally left at home when his family goes away for Christmas vacation. He must fend for himself as he faces burglars, scary neighbours and other obstacles. At first he enjoys his freedom, but soon wants his family back for Christmas.

programme.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
programme.desc: A young boy mistakenly takes the wrong plane when his family goes on Christmas vacation and ends up in New York City, fending off suspicious hotel staff, a kindly bird woman in disguise and two burglars he fought against last Christmas.

programme.title: Deck the Halls

programme.desc: The life of country music star Johnny Cash. After serving in the air force in Germany, Cash buys a guitar and begins touring. He develops a drug habit, but after getting divorced, he is eased off his addiction by June Carter, whom he eventually marries.

programme.title: Moulin Rouge!
programme.desc: A popular courtesan working at the Moulin Rouge falls in love with a poet in 1899 Paris.

programme.title: Holy Rollers
programme.desc: A young man is recommended by a friend for a good paying job, which turns out to be drug smuggling.

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: A former Special Forces soldier wants out of the game for good so he can settle down with his love, but his organization isn't prepared to let him go. Betrayed, he sets out across Europe in a dangerous game of cat-and-mouse.

programme.title: Jackie Chan's First Strike
programme.desc: A detective joins the CIA to spy on a woman who is suspected of stealing atomic secrets.

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Assigned to protect the children of an assassinated scientist, Shane Wolf is suddenly faced with two incompatible jobs: fighting evil while keeping house and protecting a family from enemies seeking a top-secret experiment.

programme.title: A Prairie Home Companion
programme.desc: A profile at what goes on backstage during the last broadcast of America's most celebrated radio show, where singing cowboys Dusty and Lefty, a country music siren, and a host of others hold court.

programme.title: The Resurrection of Gavin Stone
programme.desc: A washed-up star's latest brush with the law lands him in community service for the local church. When they start to plan their annual Passion Play, he pretends to be Christian to get the lead role. Through the play and the church, he discovers God.

programme.title: The Banger Sisters
programme.desc: Two former groupies reconnect after 20 years, despite their different paths through life. They soon come to realize that they represent two extremes, conventionalism and liberation, and that they need each other to lead happier lives.

programme.title: Lola Versus
programme.desc: A 29-year-old woman dumped by her fiancé just three weeks before their wedding embarks on a series of adventures to help her come to terms with approaching 30 as a single woman.

programme.title: John Tucker Must Die
programme.desc: A group of girls team up to get revenge on a boy who was sneaking around on all of them.

programme.title: Swingers
programme.desc: A sensitive man tries to overcome a broken heart by moving to Hollywood with his friend.

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: A banished knight, stripped of his title and livelihood, stands up against an evil ruler and avenges his fallen master.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A guy brings in 100 pounds of pure silver. Rick gets stumped when a seller brings in a mysterious book.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Prepare for liftoff with the Pawn Stars as the guys check out a toilet seat from NASA.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick and Corey have trouble seeing eye-to-eye when a 1965 Buick Riviera comes in. A jacket from the first ever Pro Bowl gets thrown into the shop. And later, Lili tries to charm the guys.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick and Corey check out a massive Dukes of Hazzard toy collection. Then, time flies when a pocket watch engraved with Henry Ford II's signature lands in the shop.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A test piece of Howard Hughes' Spruce Goose comes to the shop. Then, celebrity paintings by artist Stephen Fishwick are brought in. Later, it's any man's game when the guys make a wager over which doughnut Rick will eat.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A lunar Bible from Apollo 14; a 1930s Buck Rogers Disintegrator Gun; miniature samples of a 1950s kitchen; a 1950s Beetle Bailey original print.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Don't get fooled at the pawn shop when a seller hands Chumlee a thirty dollar bill. Will this curious cash have Chum reaching for his wallet to buy it or will it turn out to be a costly currency that's not worth making a deal.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A set of royal British armor has Rick suiting up to strike a bargain. Chumlee's purchase of a U. S. Open custom electric guitar gets no love from Rick.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick checks out a sword-pistol combo from the 1700s. A portrait of John Barrymore, the famous film and theatre actor, may be worth a buy. Rick learns about an antique navigational timepiece from the 19th century. Corey's excited about a 1969 Harley.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A seller brings his Led Zeppelin vinyl collection to Rick and Chum. A fancy 19th century office desk may be a worthwhile buy. A game-used base from the 2016 World Series could be a home run for the guys. Rick takes a trip to see 'The Object.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Two signed David Carradine replica swords; first edition of T.S Eliot's 'Four Quartets'; a 1965 Battle of the Bulge board game; a 1920s radium crock.

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick travels to Los Angeles to see what goods he can find for the shop. He discovers the largest 'Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory' prop collection in existence. Chum finds a helicopter owned by Vegas magician Dirk Arthur.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Corey bets it all on an original Triple Crown Trophy; let's see if he can win this horse race. Next the guys call in Rick Dale to save what might be one of the very first rides from Coney Island.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A revolutionary French gun, a vintage stamp book, a Kanye West Jacket and a sword from 'World of Warcraft' enter the Gold & Silver Pawn Shop.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick travels to England to test out antique weapons. Afterwards, Corey examines an item that inspired a classic movie while Rick looks at a car that belonged to Winston Churchill.

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.desc: A tiny clue enables police to determine where the victim had been just before she died; it would also lead them to her killer.
